items.sentence: Tom won\'t be going to Boston with us, but Mary will.
Tom and I have been friends since junior high school.
Tom and I have been working together for a long time.
Tom knew Mary shouldn\'t be doing what she was doing.
There were a lot of things Tom didn\'t tell us about.
Tom said no one else wanted to go to Boston with him.
You should tell Tom that Mary is planning to do that.
I can\'t even begin to imagine what Tom went through.
Tom showed me some pictures of him when he was a kid.
Tom soon realized there was someone else in the room.
